description: Work under this contract covers the maintenance and testing of High Voltage power supply and distribution switchgear, substation equipment, and auxiliary equipment, which may include minor modifications and repairs, at the Esquimalt Graving Dock (EGD) at 825 Admirals Road, Victoria B.C.

full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for High Voltage Maintenance - Phase 1

#### Invitation Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4315931689
* **Publication Date:** November 20, 2023
* **Closing Date:** December 6, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for High Voltage Maintenance - Phase 1. This project involves the maintenance and testing of High Voltage power supply and distribution switchgear, substation equipment, and auxiliary equipment at the Esquimalt Graving Dock in Victoria, British Columbia.

#### SCOPE OF WORK

The scope of work includes the maintenance and testing of various High Voltage equipment and systems, including minor modifications and repairs.

#### CONTRACT TYPES AND TERM

This is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process, with the objective of pre-qualifying interested contractors for the project. The pre-qualification list will expire upon award of a contract.

#### BIDDING PROCESS

The ITQ process consists of two phases. Phase 1 evaluates the qualifications of all interested bidders, and Phase 2 invites qualified bidders to submit a financial bid on the project.

#### CONTACT INFORMATION

* Michaela Costa (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A
* Address: N/A

#### TRADE AGREEMENTS AND REGIONAL OPPORTUNITIES

This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to qualified bidders from across Canada.

#### ATTACHMENTS AND NOTICES

* The Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) document can be downloaded from the Ariba platform.
* Additional information and instructions can be found on the PSPC website or by contacting the Contracting Authority.

#### Closing Date: 2:00 PM ET on December 6, 2023

All interested contractors are invited to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) by the closing date. Please note that late submissions will not be accepted. This project is subject to the ITQ process and the terms and conditions outlined in the Invitation to Qualify document.
